# Key



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

The Key renders a key with a label.

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                         | Type                | Default        |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------------- | ------------------- | -------------- |
| `theme`  | `theme`   | Defines the theme of the component. | `"Dark" \| "Light"` | `ThemeDefault` |


## Slots

| Slot | Description                |
| ---- | -------------------------- |
|      | Passes content to the key. |
